channel.title: currying on David Raab
channel.description: Recent content in currying on David Raab

item.title: Introduction to Functional Programming
item.description: In this article I want to give a general introduction to some of the fundamental ideas of functional programming. I just start with the idea of function as data, and explain why functions are viewed as data and why it makes sense to pass functions as arguments. When we understand this concept, I start explaining lambda expression, currying, partial application and closures. All of this ideas built on each other.
